sourcesContent:
import React, { FC } from "react"
import { Controller, SubmitHandler, useForm } from 'react-hook-form'
import { IShippingFields } from "../Types/userForm.interface"


const UserForm: FC = () => {
  
  const { 
    register,
    handleSubmit,
    formState: { errors},
    reset,
    getValues,
    getFieldState,
    watch,
    setValue,
    control,} = useForm<IShippingFields>({})


  const onSubmit: SubmitHandler<IShippingFields> = (data) => {
    console.log(`Your name ${data.name}`)
  }
  return(
    <>
     <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
     <input {...register('name', { required: 'Имя обязательно' })} type="text" placeholder='Name' />
              <button>Send</button>
      </form>
    </>
  )
}

export default UserForm;
